item.title: (Preview) Introducing new version of Self-Hosted Integration Runtime (SHIR) that is Kubernetes-based
item.description:
We heard your growing demand and feedback for this solution, and we’re excited to announce the new version of Self Hosted Integration Runtime that is Kubernetes-based for Linux is now available in public preview.
We have improved the underlying infrastructure for Self Hosted Integration Runtime to provide several benefits:
Scalability: Ability to scale to hundreds of machines. Performance: Improved performance in scanning workloads. Security (containerized): Ability to have containerized security on a Kubernetes cluster, instead of hosting SHIR on a Windows machine directly
